00012 #ifndef IF_ENGINE_H_
00013 #define IF_ENGINE_H_

00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Abstract for base class for output interface engines, which should implement  *
00017  * the fill() method to evaluate the variables that need to be written to disk.  *
00018  *                                                                               *
00019  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00020 
00021 #include <Camgen/if_output.h>
00022 
00023 namespace Camorra
00024 {
00026 
00027     template<class model_t>class interface_engine: public ps_generator_viewer<model_t>
00028     {
00029         public:
00030 
00031             /* Type definitions: */
00032 
00033             typedef model_t model_type;
00034             typedef ps_generator_viewer<model_t> base_type;
00035             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00036             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00037             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00038             typedef typename base_type::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00039 
00040             /* Public constructors: */
00041             /*----------------------*/
00042 
00044 
00045             interface_engine():output(NULL),evt_size(0){}
00046 
00048 
00049             interface_engine(const ps_generator_base<model_t>* gen_):base_type(gen_),output(NULL),evt_size(0){}
00050 
00052 
00053             interface_engine(const ps_generator_base<model_t>* gen_,interface_output<model_t>* output_):base_type(gen_),output(output_),evt_size(0){}
00054 
00055             /* Public destructors: */
00056             /*---------------------*/
00057 
00058             virtual ~interface_engine(){}
00059 
00060             /* Public modifiers: */
00061             /*-------------------*/
00062 
00064 
00065             void add_branches(interface_output<model_t>* output_)
00066             {
00067                 output=output_;
00068                 add_variables();
00069             }
00070 
00072 
00073             virtual interface_engine<model_t>* clone() const=0;
00074 
00076 
00077             virtual void fill()=0;
00078 
00079             /* Public readout functions: */
00080             /*---------------------------*/
00081 
00082             size_type event_size() const
00083             {
00084                 return evt_size;
00085             }
00086 
00087         protected:
00088 
00092 
00093             virtual void add_variables()=0;
00094 
00096 
00097             bool add_variable(const momentum_type& q,const std::string& name)
00098             {
00099                 if(output!=NULL)
00100                 {
00101                     evt_size+=sizeof(momentum_type);
00102                     return output->branch(&q,name);
00103                 }
00104                 return false;
00105             }
00106 
00108 
00109             bool add_variable(const value_type& q,const std::string& name)
00110             {
00111                 if(output!=NULL)
00112                 {
00113                     evt_size+=sizeof(value_type);
00114                     return output->branch(&q,name);
00115                 }
00116                 return false;
00117             }
00118 
00120 
00121             bool add_variable(const int& q,const std::string& name)
00122             {
00123                 if(output!=NULL)
00124                 {
00125                     evt_size+=sizeof(int);
00126                     return output->branch(&q,name);
00127                 }
00128                 return false;
00129             }
00130 
00132 
00133             bool add_variable(const bool& q,const std::string& name)
00134             {
00135                 if(output!=NULL)
00136                 {
00137                     evt_size+=sizeof(bool);
00138                     return output->branch(&q,name);
00139                 }
00140                 return false;
00141             }
00142 
00143         private:
00144 
00145             /* Output file object: */
00146 
00147             interface_output<model_t>* output;
00148 
00149             /* event size: */
00150 
00151             size_type evt_size;
00152     };
00153 }
